author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: Captivating from start to finish, 'The Nightingale' by Kristin Hannah is a poignant tale of love, sacrifice, and resilience set against the backdrop of World War II. Its vivid characters and gripping narrative make it an unforgettable read.
